verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of Ethan <S%H387><s%> the Ezrahite <S%H250><s%>. I will sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the mercies <S%H2617><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: with my mouth <S%H6310><s%> will I make known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

For I have said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be built up <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> shalt thou establish <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the very heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
I have made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my chosen <S%H972><s%>, I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>,

Thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I establish <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, and build up <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy throne <S%H3678><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy wonders <S%H6382><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the saints <S%H6918><s%>.

For who in the heaven <S%H7834><s%> can be compared <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>? who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> can be likened <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?

'Elohim <S%H410><s%> is greatly <S%H7227><s%> to be feared <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the saints <S%H6918><s%>, and to be had in reverence <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of all them that are about <S%H5439><s%> him.
O YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, who is a strong <S%H2626><s%> YY <S%H3050><s%> like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> thee?

Thou rulest <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the raging <S%H1348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: when the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof arise <S%H7721><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, thou stillest <S%H7623><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them.

Thou hast broken <S%H1792><s%> Rachav <S%H7294><s%> in pieces <S%H1792><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, as one that is slain <S%H2491><s%>; thou hast scattered <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with thy strong <S%H5797><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>.
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are thine, the earth <S%H776><s%> also is thine: as for the world <S%H8398><s%> and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof, thou hast founded <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south <S%H3225><s%> thou hast created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them: Tavor <S%H8396><s%> and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> shall rejoice <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
Thou hast a mighty <S%H1369><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: strong <S%H5810><s%> <S%H8799><s%> is thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%> is thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>.

Justice <S%H6664><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> are the habitation <S%H4349><s%> of thy throne <S%H3678><s%>: mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> shall go <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8762><s%> before thy face <S%H6440><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the people <S%H5971><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the joyful sound <S%H8643><s%>: they shall walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, in the light <S%H216><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>.
In thy name <S%H8034><s%> shall they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>: and in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shall they be exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

For thou art the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength <S%H5797><s%>: and in thy favour <S%H7522><s%> our shofar <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
For the YY <S%H3068><s%> is our defence <S%H4043><s%>; and HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is our king <S%H4428><s%>.

Then thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to thy holy one <S%H2623><s%>, and saidst <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have laid <S%H7737><s%> <S%H8765><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> upon one that is mighty <S%H1368><s%>; I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> one chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8803><s%> out of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
I have found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>; with my holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> have I anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him:
With whom my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: mine arm <S%H2220><s%> also shall strengthen <S%H553><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.
The enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall not exact <S%H5378><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon him; nor the son <S%H1121><s%> of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> afflict <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.
And I will beat down <S%H3807><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his foes <S%H6862><s%> before his face <S%H6440><s%>, and plague <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8764><s%> him.
But my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and my mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be with him: and in my name <S%H8034><s%> shall his shofar <S%H7161><s%> be exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
I will set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and his right hand <S%H3225><s%> in the rivers <S%H5104><s%>.
He shall cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Thou art my father <S%H1><s%>, my 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, and the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Also I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him my firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, higher <S%H5945><s%> than the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
My mercy <S%H2617><s%> will I keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for him for evermore <S%H5769><s%>, and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall stand fast <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> with him.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> also will I make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to endure for ever <S%H5703><s%>, and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
If his children <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my Torah <S%H8451><s%>, and walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not in my judgments <S%H4941><s%>;
If they break <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>;
Then will I visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their transgression <S%H6588><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%>, and their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes <S%H5061><s%>.
Nevertheless my lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will I not utterly take <S%H6331><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from him, nor suffer my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to fail <S%H8266><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I not break <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, nor alter <S%H8138><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the thing that is gone out <S%H4161><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Once <S%H259><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by my holiness <S%H6944><s%> that I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>, and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the sun <S%H8121><s%> before me.

It shall be established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> as the moon <S%H3394><s%>, and as a faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> in heaven <S%H7834><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
But thou hast cast off <S%H2186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and abhorred <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, thou hast been wroth <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8694><s%> with thine anointed <S%H4899><s%>.

Thou hast made void <S%H5010><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: thou hast profaned <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> by casting it to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
Thou hast broken down <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all his hedges <S%H1448><s%>; thou hast brought <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his strong holds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin <S%H4288><s%>.
All that pass by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> spoil <S%H8155><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: he is a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to his neighbours <S%H7934><s%>.

Thou hast set up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>; thou hast made all his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.
Thou hast also turned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the edge <S%H6697><s%> of his sword <S%H2719><s%>, and hast not made him to stand <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
Thou hast made his glory <S%H2892><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and cast <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> down <S%H4048><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
The days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%> hast thou shortened <S%H7114><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: thou hast covered <S%H5844><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him with shame <S%H955><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
How long, YY <S%H3068><s%>? wilt thou hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8735><s%> thyself for ever <S%H5331><s%>? shall thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%> ?
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> how short <S%H2465><s%> my time is: wherefore hast thou made <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all men <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%> ?

What man <S%H1397><s%> is he that liveth <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>? shall he deliver <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the grave <S%H7585><s%>? Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
YY <S%H136><s%>, where are thy former <S%H7223><s%> lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%>, which thou swarest <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> in thy truth <S%H530><s%> ?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, YY <S%H136><s%>, the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>; how I do bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in my bosom <S%H2436><s%> the reproach of all the mighty <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>;

Wherewith thine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> have reproached <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; wherewith they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of thine anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
